trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of user-interface related <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> objects.
This class cannot be inherited.
Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> can be enabled and disabled.
Only enabled <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> objects will receive hit test and paint messages from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

An <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> can be viewed as a proxy between user-interface related elements, which consist of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.%23ctor%2A> constructor creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection> and is enabled, by default.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>.

When an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, the collection sets this property so that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> can call back to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> is enabled.

If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Enabled%2A> property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class will send `HitTest` and `Paint` messages to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.
`true`, if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> is enabled; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> collection.
A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> objects.
Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window.
Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window within the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
The area to invalidate.
Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window within the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to invalidate.
